PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: : matrices of the same size (nl,nc). Each column i of the matrices corresponds to the coordinates of the ith curve. You can give a specific color for each curve by using list(z,colors) instead of z, where colors is a vector of size nc. If color(i) is negative the curve is plotted using the mark with id abs(style(i))+1; if style(i) is strictly positive, a plain line with color id style(i) or a dashed line with dash id style(i) is used. Use xset() to see the mark and color ids.
